data.oai_dc:dc: Body mass at emergence of C. maculatus collected in the laboratory. Presented are four selection treatments (C = Control, T = Trend, R = Red noise, W = White noise). split temp = two temperature environments the beetles were exposed to during the split brood experiment. replicate: replicate is nested within treatment(4 replicates per treatment). time point: time point of beetle collection during their emergence period (1 = early, 2 = intermediate, 3 = late hatching individuals). Fam = Family nested within replicate and treatment, per replicate 10 families were investigated. sex = sex of the individual measured. body mass = dry weight of beetle.
Experimental evolution|Environmental change|Genetic variance|Split brood experiment|Sex specific plasticity|Sex specific environmental sensitivity|Insects|Genetic correlations
